item.title: I need a bit of help?
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

For some reason the getPlugin() function is still null even though I have this:

[code=java] /**
* Creates a new plugin container
*/
@SuppressWarnings(“unchecked”)
public PluginContainer(String name, int id, boolean active) {
try {
Class plugin = (Class) Class.forName(name);

		this.setId(id);
		this.setName(name);
		this.setPlugin(plugin.newInstance());
		this.setStillActive(active);
	} catch (Exception e) {
		e.printStackTrace();
	}
}[/code]

pretty sure it has something to do with

Class plugin = (Class) Class.forName(name);

and

this.setPlugin(plugin.newInstance());

Read full topic
item.source: I need a bit of help?
